data.title: Jan Komtebedde - VP Valve Therapy at Evalve, Inc. [a wholly owned subsidiary of Abbott Vascular, Inc.]
data.meta_description: Jan Komtebedde's work experience includes a role as the VP of Valve Therapy at Evalve, Inc. starting in January 2009.
data.text:
Jan Komtebedde's work experience includes a role as the VP of Valve Therapy at Evalve, Inc. starting in January 2009. Prior to that, they held the position of VP of Marketing and Business Development from July 2001 until January 2009. Jan also worked at Heartport, Inc. as the Director of Business Development from 1996 to 2001.

Jan Komtebedde attended Utrecht University from 1980 to 1986, where they obtained a Doctor of Veterinary Medicine degree. Their studies at the university focused on various subjects, including Anatomy, Physiology, Pathophysiology, Pathology, Internal Medicine, Surgery, and Genetics.
